appetizers.name: Buffalo Wings
appetizers.description: Spicy chicken wings coated in hot sauce and served with a side of blue cheese dressing.

appetizers.name: Mozzarella Sticks
appetizers.description: Mozzarella cheese sticks covered in breading and herbs deep fried to perfection

cold sandwiches.name: Turkey Club
cold sandwiches.description: Thinly sliced turkey, lettuce, tomato, bacon, and mayonnaise on white bread.

cold sandwiches.name: Veggie Wrap
cold sandwiches.description: Lettuce, tomato, cucumber, avocado, and hummus wrapped in a soft tortilla.

hot sandwiches.name: Philly Cheesesteak
hot sandwiches.description: slices of beef, grilled onions and bell peppers, and melted provolone cheese on a hoagie roll.

hot sandwiches.name: Meatball Sub
hot sandwiches.description: Meatballs covered in marinara sauce and topped with melted mozzarella cheese on a sub roll. Usually toasted.

desserts.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
desserts.description: Soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies made with the perfect blend of ingredients.

desserts.name: Cheesecake
desserts.description: Creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust and topped with your choice of fruit or chocolate sauce.

drinks.name: Coffee
drinks.description: A hot drink that is essential and so very important to millions of people

drinks.name: Boba Tea
drinks.description: Cold tea blended to a smoothie like consistancy with tapioca pearls at the bottom.
